'''Eglantine Took (née Banks)''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Eglantine was the wife of [[Thain]] [[Paladin Took II|Paladin Took]], and mother of [[Pearl Took|Pearl]], [[Pimpernel Took|Pimpernel]], [[Pervinca Took|Pervinca]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]]. She was present at [[Bilbo Baggins]]' [[Birthday Party]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>
==Etymology==
She was named after the flower ''[[eglantine]]''.
